application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Front Garden (Front Boundary + Side Boundary) T1: Lime tree x4 - Re-pollard back to old points height 5m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 3m & spread to 3m(Left Boundary) T3: Holly tree - Trim to shape height 4m & spread 5m. Reduce height to 3.5m & spread to 4.5mT11: Dead shrub - Fell to ground level (stump to remain)* height 5m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0mBack Garden (Right Boundary) T4: Holm oak tree - Reduce height by 1 - 1.5 metres, trim to shape height 6m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 15m & spread to 4mT5: Laurel hedge - Reduce height by 2 metres, trim tight to shape (all sides) height 5m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 3m & spread to 4mT6: Bay tree - Reduce height by 3 metres back to old points, trim to shape height 6m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 13m & spread to 3mT7: Cotoneaster tree - Prune to shape by 1 metreheight 5m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 4m & spread to 4m(Left Boundary) T8: Mock orange tree - Fell to ground level, grind out stump - Height 4m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0mT9: Holly tree - Trim tight to shape height 4m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 3.9m & spread to 2mT10: Ash tree - Re-pollard back to old pointsheight 8m & spread 5m.
